Question
========

Which of the following statements are true?

Answerlist
----------

*  You can model stationary process using random walk model. 
*  There is no model to approximate dynamics of non-stationary time series.
*  A very complex model can perform worse than a naive independent observations model.
*  You can improve forecast quality by averaging forecasts of a complex model and a naive one.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

*  False. The stationary series models are similar to the independent observations model; non-stationary series models are similar to a random walk.
*  False. The stationary series models are similar to the independent observations model; non-stationary series models are similar to a random walk.
*  True. 
*  True.
